snippet: Academics at the University of Rostock approved a proposal on Wednesday to honor Edward J. Snowden, the former contractor who leaked National Security Agency documents.
abstract: Academics at the University of Rostock in Germany approve a proposal to give Edward J Snowden, former contractor who leaked National Security Agency documents, an honorary doctorate.
lead_paragraph: Academics at the University of Rostock approved a proposal on Wednesday to honor Edward J. Snowden, the former contractor who leaked National Security Agency documents.

headline.main: Germany: Snowden Approved for Honorary Doctorate
headline.print_headline: Germany: Snowden Approved for Honorary Doctorate
